channel.title: Item Contest #1 Dragon Shield
channel.description:
[b]As a second attempt to to revitalize the modeling section. I have created a second contest, seeing as how the last one was a failure. I made this one a easier to get newer modelers interested.[/b]
[b]The object is to edit the shield as you see fit. Add details, delete faces, whatever you want to it. Just try to keep the wireframe nice and clean. The community will vote and the winners shield revision will be animated. [/b] Here is a preview of the Shield base http://youtu.be/Jbklt1EdncE
Here is download. http://www.mediafire.com/?ud0960r55qjc5w6
Post your entries here or pm them to me and they will be added to the poll.

item.title: Item Contest #1 Dragon Shield
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

dylan_0789:

These contest don’t generally spark an interest in modeling. Its best to host them when activity spikes. How do you get activity to spike first? Well, I find when some of the better modelers start posting it inspires new people to try it. Which would be nice because this sections withering.

agreed

Read full topic

As a second attempt to to revitalize the modeling section. I have created a second contest, seeing as how the last one was a failure. I made this one a easier to get newer modelers interested.

The object is to edit the shield as you see fit. Add details, delete faces, whatever you want to it. Just try to keep the wireframe nice and clean.
